entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Data.Odbc OdbcFactory.Instance is null #82920
  • System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests failed in CI on mono_interpreter linux x64 Debug leg #82918
  • [API Proposal]: make payload types in System.Net.Http.DiagnosticsHandler to be public #82910
  • [browser][icu] Automate custom icu creation #82908
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Remove method body for inlined methods #82907
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Avoid generating rgctx fetch trampolines in generic sharing #82906
    Future
  • [wasi][icu] bundle icu files into .wasm #82895
  • Several XML tests are sporadically failing in CI due to OOMs #82894
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Code analyse rule that require passing of cancellation token #82889
  • [browser] don't publish native DLLs #82888
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata not implemented on monovm #82887
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedWindowsPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue #82885
  • [browser] FetchError: request failed, reason: Parse Error: Invalid header value char #82880
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 breaking change in HttpClient timeout handling #82878
  • Dotnet7-Alpine3.17 has an error during the pre-login handshake #82892
  • Error in fresh Ubuntu 22.04.2 install: setlocale: LC_ALL: cannot change locale (en_US.UTF-8) crossgen-corelib.proj #82873
  • [API Proposal]: Add an overload of the StackTrace constructor to take in an array of frames #82871
  • Not able to serialize Geometry with System.Text.Json #82870

Closed

  • GC overestimates available memory #82815
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Respect `WASMTIME_PATH` #82391
    8.0.0
  • Size regression in Minimal API NativeAOT app #82732
  • [API Proposal]: Make it easier to create quality ValidateOptionsResult instances #77404
    8.0.0
  • Upgrading Visual Studio from 17.3 to 17.5 causes Blazor errors in the console #82778
  • [API Proposal]: Add Random.GetItem(IReadOnlyList<T> choices) #80651
    8.0.0
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync edge case deadlock #82427
  • Howto implement HashSet.GetOrAdd(T) extension method in .NET 6 or .NET 7 using CollectionsMarshal #82875
  • Different behaviour of default interface impelmentation in monoVM vs CoreCLR #81882
    8.0.0
  • Failures in SSL Stream tests: There are no more endpoints available in the endpoint mapper. #74838
    8.0.0
  • Address NativeAOT header file strategy to allow windows global definitions to co-exist #81285
    8.0.0
  • dotnet 7 System.Text.Json JsonSerializer.Serialize exception: is marked required but does not specify a setter. #82879
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Ignore only (de)serialization #82904
  • Currency and Number formatting separators for en-BE CultureInfo is incorrect for Core #82898
  • Icon/Image from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80261
    8.0.0
  • SoundPlayer from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80264
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose method on PeriodicTimer to adjust interval #60384
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] `Invariant.Tests` failing with `Failed to load ./icudt.dat` #82567
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 WebAssembly - Algorithm 'Aes' is not supported on this platform. #82472
    Future
  • Some `System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.ReverseEndiannessUnitTests` tests broken on `main` #82868
  • [wasm] System.Memory.Tests broken if SIMD is enabled #82808
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(this string? text, Range range) #77955
    8.0.0
  • bool does not implement IParsable<TSelf> #78523
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: String should implement IParsable<string> #78842
  • Crossgen hangs and crashes on MacOs #81570
  • NET7 macOS: Impossible to symbolize managed addresses in AppCenter #80550
    Future
  • Cross architecture CLRDEBUGINFO<host_os><host_arch> resource missing on windows coreclr #78282
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Port #82470 (disable EventPipe stack collection with environment variable) to 7.0 #82921
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [jiterp] Perform a single unsigned bounds check for array accesses #82919
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Adding System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.BitCast #82917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a few async void tests to be async Task #82914
  • Add IPAddress ISpanFormattable/Parsable implementations #82913
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow default AsyncFlowControls rather than throwing #82912
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] More cross compiler fixes. #82911
  • Bump xharness to fix TCP issue in maccatalyst #82903
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • [release/7.0] Fix pthread_cond_wait race on macOS #82893
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [browser] Calculate hash for runtime assets #82891
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Implement managed SegmentCommandLine #82883
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Guard more COM interop related code #82882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Enable symbol stripping for crossgen2" #82881
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Improve DateTime.ParseExact perf for invariant culture #82877
    area-System.Globalization, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Improve controlling which scenarios test libraries should be run against #82876
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Only call base.DisposeAsync on classes derived from FileStream #82874
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • Disable SupportedWindowsPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue on Windows Arm64 #82902
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][aot] Emit cctor instantiations for classes referenced by gshar… #82900
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit a list of exported methods into the AOT image and load them when the image is loaded. #82809
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
  • Mark some internal/private structs as readonly #82415
    area-Meta
  • [wasi] CI: Provision `wasi-sdk`, and `wasmtime` only when needed #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Fix tests substitution conditions #82901
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add dedicated empty array enumerator for footprint reduction #82899
    area-System.Runtime
  • Introducing ValidateOptionsResultBuilder #82749
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Mark Microsoft.NET.ILLink as non-shipping #82905
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Disable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #82915
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix string allocation in DateTimeParse.ParseByFormat #82861
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Stop storing the parsed RID fallback graph #82811
    area-Host
  • disable tests on Server 2022 with spanish locale #82578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Append version to RID only with valid characters #81497
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix SoundPlayer handling of partial reads on streams #82612
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Fix Icon(Stream) handling of partial reads #82621
    area-System.Drawing
  • [workloads] Upstream workload fixes from 7.0 #82069
    area-Workloads
  • EventPipe lock implementation #82790
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary relinking when publishing a blazor project for AOT #82748
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add PeriodicTimer.Period property #82560
    area-System.Threading
  • Move throw out of inlined CompositeFormat helper #82543
    area-System.Runtime
  • Combine ExecutionContext/CapturedContext fields in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #82181
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Glossary: Change SoS link to documentation and describe origin in description. (Was: Change source for SoS to Wayback Machine link) #81178
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • disable SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose also on Catalyst #82782
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Use shared IValueTaskSource implementation in AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs #82147
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Pass wasi invariant mode through env variable #82707
    arch-wasm
  • ActiveIssue for BuildInvalidSignatureTwice on mono interpreter. #82864
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][interp] Fix incorrect masking #82890
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][docs] Update keywords. #82896
    documentation, arch-wasm
  • Add MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(string, Index/Range) #82794
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify IndexOfAnyAsciiByteValues for needles with 0 on X86 #82866
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Have bool and string implement ISpanParsable<T> #82836
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Fix intrinsics substitution condition #82886
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82852
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Move networking code to debugger component #82785
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] remove unused methods #82865
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable symbol stripping for crossgen2 #82698
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add OS/architecture specific CLRDEBUGINFO resource #82863
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Unify Array enumerators between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #82751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed name of frozen string dictionary files #82482
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2125925 #82869
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try skipping generation of empty method dictionaries #82591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2122151 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove JTRUE(relop) invariant in the backend #82766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable runtime tests running on arm64 with mini JIT #82814
  • Implement correct handling of new constraint in ilc #82818
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] Smoke tests for node on runtime pipeline #78769
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • Remove the defunct DiagnosticUtility/Fx classes from DataContractSerialization #82324
    area-Serialization
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Nullable annotation fixes #82803
    area-Meta
  • [tests] Retain OutDir for ioslike tests #82313
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add tests for build with SIMD disabled #82845
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter trace entry point selection heuristic #82604
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82851
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use SecurityTransforms for RSA+PSS #82728
    area-System.Security, os-ios, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation for MONO_PATCH_INFO_METHOD #82711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use output size helpers for cryptographic primitives #82800
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #82781
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82855
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82854
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - native #82834
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Add type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to System.Drawing.Common.dll #82839
    area-System.Drawing
  • add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82284
    area-Meta
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - managed #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • Enable DwarfDump AOT test in Release #82862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
